page.title: 11SPORTS FACILITIES.
page.content: The{golf course}is situated on the Northern edge of the village,on the Fairstead.It is only a nine hole course,and fees range from Â£1 to Â£5 per day during the summer season. Visitors are welcome. The{Jubilee Field}is beside the river Tyne on the Southern edge of the village.It has swings and a climbing frame erected by the Parish Council. The local{Sports Association}is planning to extend the existing facilities at the Middle School to develop the tennis courts,cricket pitch and make a five-a-side football pitch. There is a swimming pool attached to the Riverdale Hotel which is open to residents of Bellingham.The next nearest swimming pool is at Hexham.
